041596-d-04-15-96-YVRR.Narrative: STOPPED AT WEYERHAEUSER (MP K77.0) TO SET OUT 4 MTY BOX CARS. POSITION OF 4 MTY BOX CARS IN THE TRAIN & DISTANCE INTO WEYERHAEUSER SIDING REQUIRED LOCOS & A PORTION OF TRAIN TO PASS THRU PVT. FARM XING AT MP K77.6, 6 TIMES & ON 7TH PASS THRU XING, MAJOR DERAILMENT OCCURRED CAUSING 3 MTY CARS COUPLEDTO ENGS. & LAST 4 LOCOS (8311, 696, 8092, 205) ON THE GROUND. INVESTIGATION REVEALED LEAD TRUCKS ON1ST CAR COUPLED TO ENGS. DERAILED COMING THRU PVT. FARM XING ON 6TH PASS & TRAVELED WESTWARD "ON THE GROUND" FOR APPROX. 90 FT WHERE TRAIN STOPPED & THEN STARTED TO BACK UP TO COMPLETE THE SWITCH.WHEN THE DERAILED LEAD TRUCKS ON 1ST CAR ENCOUNTERED FARM XING, TRAIN JACK-KNIFED, DERAILING 1ST 3 MTYCARS & LAST 4 LOCOS. BOTTOM DRAIN PLUG IN LOCO 4311'S FUEL TANK WAS STRUCK & APPROX. 3 GALS. OF DIESEL FUEL DRAINED OUT ON ROADBED. THE AREA WAS BERMED UP -SPILLED FUEL WAS RETRIEVED- FRESH STRAW SPREAD INSIDE BERM TO SOAK UP ANY ADDITIONAL FUEL. RESULTANT DAMAGE DID NOT PERMIT EXACT CAUSE OF DERAILMENT TO BE PINPOINTED, BUT ES5IMATED THAT POSSIBLE COMBINATION OF WIDE GAUGE IN PVT. FARM XING & SLACK CAUSED LEAD TRUCKS ON 1ST CAR TO DERAIL DURING TRAIN'S 6TH PASS THRU XING.NoneNoneNone

G2917-d-04-28-96-WC.Narrative: THE 2330 SWITCH CREW WAS PERFORMING SWITCHING DUTIES IN THE FOND DU LAC YARD ON TRACK 53. THEY HAD BEGUN TO PULL TRACK 53 WHEN THE CONDUCTOR NOTICED THEY WERE MISSING APPROX. 30 CARS. HE STOPPED THE MOVEMENT & PROCEEDED TO RADIO THE EAST YARD TO LOCATE THE MISSING CARS. IT WAS AT THIS TIME, THAT THECONDUCTOR SAW THE MISSING CARS COMING BACK AT THE STANDING TRAIN. THE CARS HIT THE STANDING TRAIN AT APPROX. 10-20 MPH. THE CARS AT THE POINT OF IMPACT DID NOT DERAIL, HOWEVER, AS THE CREW STRETCHEDTHEIR TRAIN THEY FOUND THAT THE 25TH THRU 27TH CARS HAD DERAILED. INVESTIGATION OF THE INCIDENT REVEALED THAT THE 1400 SWITCH CREW HAD MADE A CUT ON TRACK 53 PRIOR TO THE 2330 SWITCH CREW. THE 1400 SWITCH FAILED TO NSURE THAT THE CARS HAD COUPLED & LEFT THE STANDING CARS UNSECURED WHICH ALLOWED THEMTO ROLL BACK DOWN TRACK 53 WHEN THE 2330 SWITCH MADE THEIR PULL.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

96040304-d-04-12-96-SOO.Primary Accident Cause: Other miscellaneous causes (Provide detailed description in narrative)

96040304-d-04-12-96-SOO.Narrative: BENSENVILLE HUMP YARD ASSIGNMENT 1302 WHILE IN HUMP OPERATIONS TELESCOPED 4 CARS ON 45A & STRIKING CAR ON 46A AT BENSENVILLE, IL, CLASSIFICATION YARD. THE HUMP WAS IN OPERATION WHEN UNKNOWN TO CREW THAT THE LIST HAD IMPROPERLY COMPUTER GENERATED WEIGHTS, WHEN THEY RELEASED THE CARS WHICH THE RETARDERS DID NOT SLOW DOWN, RESULTING IN AN OVERSPEED IMPACT ON 45A & 46A TRACKS.
